response.overview: In a mixed private party a crime is committed one of the female invitees gets overdosed on drugs so the host of the party decides to hold everyone under armed house arrest, followed by a wide panack and accusations to who's the real killer and among a number of suspected persons right before the interval of the police authorities and starting the investigations which would lead to discovering a linked homicide who was also killed by the same Murderer
response.title: Villa 54
